TopicTitle: VAB/SPH Terrain missing! Skybox white and red!

Articles.Content:
As the title states. When I enter the VAB or the SPH, the in-game terrain doesn't appear; the use of custom skyboxes creates a white and red field. I presume these bugs involve ATM, but I'm not sure. Here is a list of mods I'm using and please present a temporary fix until these bugs are eradicated! The game still is playable though.

Active Texture Management

Boulder Co. with Astronomers visual pack v3 BETA

BoxSat 2.0c

Deadly Reentry

Distant Object 1.5.1bis

DMagic

EVE

FASA (just the towers)

Firespitter .dll

KAS 4.10

Kerbal Engineer

Hyperedit

KSPX

Hot Rockets

ORIGAMI dishes (aesthetics only)

Near Future Solar and Electricity

6S Compartments

Planet Shine 2.2.1

Procedural Fairings

Real Chute

RLA Stockalike (RCS)

SCANsat

Smoke Screen for hot rockets

Snacks! Life Support and parts

SpaceY

Surface Lights

Tantares (Phobos grunt and ATV)

Texture Replacer

Tweak Scale

Tweakable Everything

Module Fixer and

Module Manager 2.5.6

Edited December 28, 2014 by TheZenGuy
